If Christina does have a Coin, boosts the physical attack of all allies that use physical attacks by a moderate amount and her own physical attack by a massive amount.

skill_data.name: Destruction
skill_data.description: If Christina does not have a Coin, deals moderate physical damage to an enemy directly in front. If Christina does have a Coin, deals moderate physical damage to an enemy directly in front and boosts the TP Boost of all allies by a small amount.
